mapper.select: select reserve_no as reserveNo, store_no as storeNo, store_name as storeName, reserve_date as reserveDate, eat_date as eatDate, eat_time as eatTime, (select count(*) from review rv where rv.reserve_no=r.reserve_no) rStatus from reserve r where member_no = #{memberNo}

select reserve_no as reserveNo, rs.member_no as memberNo, store_no as storeNo, store_name as storeName, reserve_date as reserveDate, eat_date as eatDate, eat_time as eatTime, eat_num as eatNum, (select member_name from member m where member_no = rs.member_no) as reserverName from reserve rs where store_no = #{storeNo} order by 5 desc
